page.title: 06SCHOOL DAY IN WIS. GREEN
page.content: I get out of bed, take my pyjamas off and get dressed. I have my breakfast, then get my coat and shoe bag ready. I come to school, put my bag on my peg and sit down and read until the teacher says"Stop". We go to P.E. when we climb ropes and do gymnastics on the apparatus. After P.E. we have a bottle of milk to drink and we go out to play in the playground. After play sometimes we do sums and sometimes we write in our English books and sometimes we watch a school TV programme. Some children work on the computer. At 12 noon we go to the toilet and wash our hands. We then line up and cross the road to the canteen and we have our lunch. If it is sunny we play on the school field. We do more work then have another playtime at 2.30 p.m. The teacher reads us a story until hometime.
